sentences.english: On the grounds of modern emergency medicine, defibrillation has to be performed in combination with CPR.
sentences.chinese: 根據現代急救理念，電除顫必須與心肺復甦聯合應用。

sentences.english: Time is not on our side. We need to keep moving forward and we need to move fast.
sentences.chinese: 時不我待，我們必須不斷前進，行動迅速。

sentences.english: Some other drugs have to be taken on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 而其他某些藥物，必須在空腹服用。

sentences.english: The ICC must decide whether to indict the suspects.
sentences.chinese: 國際刑事法庭必須決定是否起訴這些嫌犯。

sentences.english: He told me that I should have sold tickets.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我，我必須賣票啊。
然而，我們必須小心謹慎。

sentences.english: The safety valve shall feature a raised seat and non-mechanical disc alignment.
sentences.chinese: 安全閥必須配置凸出的閥座和非機械式閥瓣排列。

sentences.english: The principal must be hard-working, good at learning and enterprising.
sentences.chinese: 校長必須是一個勤奮學習，善於學習，勇於進取的人。

sentences.english: We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須首先計算出驅動這艘船需要多大馬力。

sentences.english: Reading is good, but we have to choose what to read.
sentences.chinese: 讀書是一好事，但我們必須多加註意書的選擇。

sentences.english: We need to unleash massive private investment in clean energy.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在清潔能源方面發動大量的私人投資。

sentences.english: The letter is to be handed to him in person.
sentences.chinese: 這封信必須面交他本人。

sentences.english: The subject of any other monograph must comply throughout its period of use.
sentences.chinese: 任何另外的專論的內容必須遵守其使用週期。

sentences.english: Those two ideas must be kept distinct from one another.
sentences.chinese: 必須把那兩種思想區分開。

sentences.english: He needs to improve his English before he can study abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他到國外唸書之前必須先加強英文。

sentences.english: Since it is very cold at the top, coverall is required.
sentences.chinese: 由於山頂很冷，連身服裝是必須的。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
